text:
Womply | Principal Security Engineer | San Francisco | Fulltime | $150k+ & equity

Womply helps small/medium size businesses who provide 60% of employment in US thrive in the digital age and counter the amazons and walmarts of the world. With over 100,000 paying businesses and $50mil raised, we are looking for a very capable security professional to lead and run our security function. full description: https://www.womply.com/jobs/san-francisco/?gh_jid=1025847

or email me bashir womply
